item.title: fix (bug HIVEMIND-176)
item.description:
fix by JC (fixes bug HIVEMIND-176)
: HiveMind LoggingInterceptor incompatible with proxies generated by outside means (CGLIB or Javassist)

item.title: fix (bug HIVEMIND-169)
item.description:
fix by JC (fixes bug HIVEMIND-169)
: Using JDK proxied service in ServicePropertyFactory doesn't work

item.title: fix (bug HIVEMIND-159)
item.description:
fix by JC (fixes bug HIVEMIND-159)
: documentation on <filter after="..."> is reverse

item.title: fix (bug HIVEMIND-171)
item.description:
fix by AH (fixes bug HIVEMIND-171)
: JMX Support does not work if you use the class directly as the interface

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by AH : Start script of example classes not working because of wrong packages

item.title: add (bug HIVEMIND-177)
item.description:
add by JC (fixes bug HIVEMIND-177)
: Allow for customization of "parameter index" in StrategyFactory.

item.title: add (bug HIVEMIND-85)
item.description:
add by KW (fixes bug HIVEMIND-85)
:
New conditional "if" attribute to <sub-modules> Thanks to Johan Lindquist.
